content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position y)

### Copper plate factory at position(x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position y) that produces copper plates from copper ore
- Assembling machine (position z) that requires iron-plate, iron-gear-wheel, and electronic-circuit to produce various items

### Iron gear wheel factory at position(x)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z) that requires iron-plate to produce iron gear wheels
- Inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine

### Copper cable factory at position(x)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z) that requires copper plates to produce copper cables
- Inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine

### Electricity generator at position(x)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position y)
- Boiler (position z)
- Offshore pump (position a)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to missing ingredients
- Ensure you have all required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron-gear-wheel requires iron-plate which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the desired location.

### Errors when attempting to smelt without the necessary items
- Always verify that you have the required raw materials (e.g., copper ore for copper plates) in the furnace before starting the smelting process.
